Class.ClassComment: CacheEntryVisitedEvent /** * This event subtype is passed in to any method annotated with {@link org.infinispan.notifications.cachelistener.annotation.CacheEntryVisited}. * @author Manik Surtani * @since 4.0 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Retrieves the value of the entry being visited. * @return the value of the visited entry */
